seoyeon.qty:
Fate is not
a path to be followed
but a road to be built.

jiwoo.qty:
A sound soul
dwells within a sound mind
and a sound body.

yooyeon.qty:
To chase perfection
is a noble call,
to believe it exists
is delusion.

soomin.qty:
Everything
is but a speck of dust
in the vast universe.
Free yourself
of trivial troubles.

nakyoung.qty:
Let your spirit
burn like fire
and be a beacon to those
who wish to be ignited.

yubin.qty:
In times of tremor
be still
and thaw the wisdom
frozen deep inside your mind.

dahyun.qty:
Perseverance
transforms failure
into strength to take a step
closer to victory.

yeonji.qty:
Become an ocean
that grows more fearsome
as the storm arrives.

nien.qty:
Your life is a canvas,
every moment a stroke of a brush,
and what you make of it
a picture for everyone to see.

sohyun.qty:
Shadows exist
only because there is light.
Your adversity is a sign,br>of the fortune ahead.

xinyu.qty:
In your soul lies a dragon
yearning to reach the heavens,
striving for something beyond greatness.

mayu.qty:
Sing your song
and move to your beat.
Everyone has their own kind of music.

joobin.qty:
The weight of the world
is not yours to carry.
It is shared among those
who wish to lighten its load.

hayeon.qty:
Let your vision
lead you to wisdom,
not despair..

jiyeon.qty:
Hope is lost
once you give up searching.
